Package nl.han.ica.oopg.tile

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
nl.han.ica.oopg.tile.Tile
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmptyTile, MockTile
public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
The tile Object is used to bind a Sprite to an location in a TileMap Extend tile to create different types of tiles.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Tile​(Sprite sprite)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Sprite getSprite()
    Use to get the Sprite object which is used to draw the image of the tile.
    void setSprite​(Sprite sprite)
    Use to set an new Sprite object to replace the image used to draw the tile.
    void setSpriteSize​(int size)
    Use to set the height and width of a Sprite object to an single size to ensure the sprite is an rectangle.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Tile

      public Tile​(Sprite sprite)
      Parameters:
      sprite - The image which will be drawn whenever the draw method of the tile is called.

  • Method Details

    • getSprite

      public Sprite getSprite()
      Use to get the Sprite object which is used to draw the image of the tile.
      Returns:
      sprite

    • setSprite

      public void setSprite​(Sprite sprite)
      Use to set an new Sprite object to replace the image used to draw the tile.
      Parameters:
      sprite - The new image which will be drawn whenever the draw method of the tile is called.

    • setSpriteSize

      public void setSpriteSize​(int size)
      Use to set the height and width of a Sprite object to an single size to ensure the sprite is an rectangle.
      Parameters:
      size - int which stands for the amount of pixels the Sprite must set for its height and width.
